learning_objective: Create programs that use variables to store and modify data.
question_str:
{
    "Question": "Mika is planning a road trip and wants to calculate the estimated travel time based on the distance and average speed. Mika writes the following code:What should Mika add to calculate the estimated travel time in hours?",
    "Answer1": "Divide the distance variable by the time variable",
    "Answer2": "Multiply the distance variable by the time variable",
    "Answer3": "Divide the time variable by the distance variable",
    "Answer4": "Multiply the time variable by the distance variable",
    "CorrectAnswer": "3",
    "Explanation": "To calculate the estimated travel time based on the distance and average speed, divide the distance variable by the time variable. This will give the time taken in hours.",
    "code_snippet": "integer distance = 300\ninteger speed = 60\ninteger time = distance / speed\noutput time"
}
